rules.natural: If food consignment Alpha passes inspection by the EU Food Safety Agency, then food consignment Alpha is cleared for distribution
If the EU Food Safety Agency detects an anomaly in food consignment Alpha, then the EU Food Safety Agency confirms contamination in food consignment Alpha
Either Global Foods Inc identifies a supplier breach or Global Foods Inc discovers a laboratory error
If Global Foods Inc discovers a laboratory error, then the EU Food Safety Agency does not impose trade sanctions
Given that Global Foods Inc has liability insurance, then if Global Foods Inc identifies a supplier breach, the EU Food Safety Agency does not impose trade sanctions
If food consignment Beta passes inspection by the EU Food Safety Agency, then food consignment Alpha is cleared for distribution
Either food consignment Alpha meets microbiological standards or food consignment Beta meets microbiological standards
If food consignment Beta meets microbiological standards, then food consignment Beta passes inspection by the EU Food Safety Agency
If Global Foods Inc has export authorization for food consignment Alpha, then food consignment Alpha is cleared for distribution
If Global Foods Inc initiates recall procedure, then the EU Food Safety Agency detects an anomaly in food consignment Alpha
If Global Foods Inc initiates recall procedure, then the EU Food Safety Agency does not issue a public alert
If the EU Food Safety Agency confirms contamination in food consignment Alpha, then the EU Food Safety Agency issues a public alert

Should it not be the case that if the World Health Organization declares a food crisis then the World Trade Organization grants emergency approval, then the United Nations does not activate emergency fund

If it is not true that food consignment Alpha meeting microbiological standards leads to food consignment Alpha passing inspection by the EU Food Safety Agency, then the World Health Organization requires an emergency meeting

Provided that it is not the case that the failure of the World Health Organization declaring a food crisis to result in the World Trade Organization granting emergency approval leads to the United Nations activating emergency fund, then the EU Food Safety Agency imposes trade sanctions
If Global Foods Inc does not have export authorization for food consignment Alpha, then Global Foods Inc initiates recall procedure
If food consignment Alpha is not cleared for distribution, then the World Health Organization declares a food crisis

The World Trade Organization does not grant emergency approval
